turn.2: 1983–84 DFB-Pokal The 1983–84 DFB-Pokal was the 41st season of the annual German football cup competition.
turn.4: It began on 16 August 1983 and ended on 31 May 1984.
turn.6: In the final Bayern Munich defeated Borussia Mönchengladbach 8–7 on penalties to take their seventh title.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: It was the first time the cup final was decided by a penalty shootout.
turn.10: Controversy raged after the penalty shoot out.
turn.12: Lothar Matthäus was playing his last game for Moenchengladbach before his big Summer move to Bayern.
